Hi there!

I find what FOP dont work with hyphenation patterns files, encoded as UTF-8. 
This limitation to make unpossible the hyphenation with UTF-8 FO-files and 
complicate the using not-Latin1 character encodings (such as cyrillic, greek 
etc.)

Thanks.
